name: Sinfeld Remastered
description:
Serenity Now!

Sinfeld Remastered is a single player action-horror-comedy-parody featuring various gameplay styles inspired by Resident Evil, Silent Hills and PT. Donathan makes his way through the maze of strangely familiar locations. You will solve puzzles, riddles, and dodge the crazies in this new nightmare of what we think New York looks like, having never been there.
Key Features:

A Personal Story: Who is Donathan? Who names a kid Donathan? How did he end up in this nightmare with Uncle Gerry and the gang? The answers lie within.
A Familiar Place?: "Why do I feel like I've been here?" Sinfeld Remastered has returned to the place where it all began.
Escape Rooms Connected!: Every level is fun to explore! Escape it if you want to!
Easter Eggs Galore: Collect them all!
